text: Kubernetes is a

powerful container orchestrator,
but managing it can be a challenge.

Self-managing clusters can overwhelm teams
with setup, network
and security management,

scaling and patching across
cloud, on-premises or hybrid environments.

This complexity demands special skills,
diverting

time away from innovation
while increasing costs.
Introducing Amazon EKS,
a fully managed Kubernetes service,
that automates Kubernetes
cluster management,
ensuring high
availability,
performance, and security
for your applications.
Built on AWSâ€™s secure infrastructure

Amazon EKS offers automatic capacity
planning

and resilience for your production
grade Kubernetes workloads.
By offloading cluster operations to AWS,

EKS reduces infrastructure management
efforts, enabling developers

to focus on business logic,
while accelerating time to market.

EKS unifies operations across
cloud, on premises,

and edge environments
by standardizing tooling and natively

integrating with AWS services,
allowing you to run applications

anywhere. With flexible
pricing and compute options,

it automatically provisions
infrastructure, selects optimal compute

instances,
and dynamically scales resources

on demand,
lowering the total cost of ownership.

Simplify Kubernetes management
and let Amazon EKS help

you concentrate on what truly matters:
innovation and business growth.
Get started today!
